item.title: Fuji Xerox provides an introduction to 3D printing in Singapore
item.description:
Eugene Ying inquired about the audience’s understanding of additive manufacturing. Singapore offers ample resources for those interested in 3D printing, according to Eugene Ying, 3D Sales Manager for Fuji Xerox Asia Pacific. He made this statement during the Fuji Xerox DocuWorld event in Singapore. Ying emphasized the rapid commercialization of 3D printing, citing Airbus as a prime example. As of September 2017, Airbus incorporated a 3D-printed titanium bracket into the production of their A350 XWB aircraft...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fuji-xerox-provides-an-introduction-to-3d-printing-in-singapore/

item.title: The latest digital tools that lead to business success
item.description:
Ebenezer Heng, Principal Consultant at Top Advertising, emphasizes that businesses must understand and leverage the connection between online and offline marketing to thrive. Speaking at the Fuji Xerox DocuWorld Conference, he argued that traditional success factors like “gut feel” are no longer enough in today’s digital landscape. He illustrated this with the example of choosing a business location. Simply observing foot traffic isn’t sufficient; online sentiment analysis, which gauges public opinion about a location, can reveal a different picture of popularity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-latest-digital-tools-that-lead-to-business-success/

item.title: DocuWorks 9 is compatible with cloud and mobile devices
item.description:
Fuji Xerox Asia Pacific has introduced DocuWorks 9, a document management software now enhanced with cloud integration for seamless mobile workflows. DocuWorks allows users to interact with electronic documents, such as office files and images, as if they were physical copies. The latest mobile features empower users to pick up their work anytime, anywhere. A new feature called Task Space lets users gather work-related documents and sync them to Fuji Xerox’s cloud-based Working Folder with a simple click...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/docuworks-9-is-compatible-with-cloud-and-mobile-devices/
